# Steps to reproduce

Have a module in `./out/MyModule` like `./out/MyModule/MyModule.ps{d,m}1`.

```powershell
Import-Module out/MyModule
```

# Expected behavior

```none
<module imports successfully>
```

# Actual behavior

```none
ipmo : The specified module 'out/MyModule' was not loaded because no valid module file was found in any module directory.
At line:1 char:1
+ ipmo out/PSPackageProject
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ CategoryInfo          : ResourceUnavailable: (out/PSPackageProject:String) [Import-Module], FileNotFoundException
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : Modules_ModuleNotFound,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand
```
